name: Organizational Behaviour
description: Introduction to the nature of organizations and the behaviour of individuals and groups within organizations, including topics such as culture and diversity, reward systems, motivation, leadership, politics, communication, decision-making, conflict and group processes. Not recommended for students in Commerce programs.
department: Centre for Industrial Relations and Human Resources
prerequisites: Enrolment in the Industrial Relations & Human Resources program (ASSPE1536/ASMAJ1536) or 4.0 or more FCEs and a minimum cgpa of 2.3
